mapper.sql: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, (select commoncode.cmn_code_kor from commoncode where commoncode.cmn_no = mem_membertype) mem_membertype_name, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from member
mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, mem_membertype_name, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from ( select ceil(rownum/#{contentsPerPage}) page, mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, mem_membertype_name, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from ( select mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, (select commoncode.cmn_code_kor from commoncode where commoncode.cmn_no = mem_membertype) mem_membertype_name, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from member order by mem_no ) ) where page = #{pageNo}

select COP_NO, MEM_NO, COP_TYPE, COP_USED, (select commoncode.cmn_code_kor from commoncode where commoncode.cmn_no = COP_TYPE) COP_TYPE_NAME, (select commoncode.cmn_code_kor from commoncode where commoncode.cmn_no = COP_USED) COP_USED_VALUE, COP_USEDATE from coupon
